Find Yourself
Who You Are Is A Product Of Your Journey






Words from The Directors
This movie made us realize that we dont really need to run. It is perfectly normal to walk on your own pace. Not the pace that other people have defined for you.
It was very heart warming finding other students like us relating to our own problems. Made us realize that in one way or another we can all sympathize with one another.
God! Isn't it just great to stop being competitive for once and find other students listening to you? The answer is yes. Yes it is.






"It wasn't until we created this film when we realized how much we've all been going through for the past 4 years, and I've got to say that it is just beautiful finding people you can relate to." - Seif Amr
